## FlowEditorState.getUniformTextStyle() method

Gets a uniform text style from the current selection

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getUniformTextStyle(diff?: Set<keyof TextStyleProps>): TextStyle;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  diff | Set&lt;keyof TextStyleProps&gt; | An optional set that is populated with style keys with non-uniform values |

<b>Returns:</b>

TextStyle
